Documentation

commitCommand :: String -> IO () Source #

Commits currently staged files with specified message.

storeCommit :: String -> Map FilePath ShaHash -> IO ShaHash Source #

Stores commit with specified message and using staged files.

loadCommitObjects :: ShaHash -> IO (Map FilePath ShaHash) Source #

Loads specified commits' objects.
